00019 class ImagesModel extends Galleria_Model_Collection
00020 {
00021 
00030     public function getImageInfo($pid)
00031     {
00032         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00033         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00034             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00035                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.pg, pd.year, pd.desc, pd.cid, pd.cname, pd.shown FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.pid = ?');
00036                 $sth->execute(array($pid));
00037             } else {
00038                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.pg, pd.year, pd.desc, pd.cid, pd.cname FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.pid = ? AND pd.shown = TRUE AND (pd.gid IS NULL OR pd.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . '))');
00039                 $sth->execute(array_merge(array($pid), Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()));
00040             }
00041         } else {
00042             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.pg, pd.year, pd.desc, pd.cid, pd.cname FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.pid = ? AND pd.shown = TRUE AND pd.gid IS NULL');
00043             $sth->execute(array($pid));
00044         }
00045         $obj = $sth->fetchObject();
00046         return ($obj) ? new Galleria_Image_Object($obj) : null;
00047     }

00057     public function getImageTags($pid)
00058     {
00059         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00060         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT top.tid, top.name FROM galleria.tagsofpictures AS top WHERE top.pid = ?');
00061         $sth->execute(array($pid));
00062         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00063     }
00064 
00073     public function fileFound($pid)
00074     {
00075         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00076         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT p.id FROM galleria.pictures AS p WHERE p.id = ?');
00077         $sth->execute(array($pid));
00078         return ($this->_fetchObjects($sth));
00079     }
00080 
00089     public function checkPermission($pid)
00090     {
00091         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00092         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00093             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00094                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.pid = ?');
00095                 $sth->execute(array($pid));
00096             } else {
00097                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.pid = ? AND pd.shown = TRUE AND (pd.gid IS NULL OR pd.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . '))');
00098                 $sth->execute(array_merge(array($pid), Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()));
00099             }
00100         } else {
00101             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.pid = ? AND pd.shown = TRUE AND pd.gid IS NULL');
00102             $sth->execute(array($pid));
00103         }
00104         $obj = $sth->fetchObject();
00105         return ($obj);
00106     }
